snippet.title: Poltergeist Prodigy Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
You are a new ghost, and to continue existing and uncover how you died you must haunt the living. Delight in being a mischievous ghost in this first person haunter.

This second trailer for Poltergeist Prodigy shows more gameplay from the upcoming First Person Haunter. Learn how to scare the living from your more experienced and comedic mentor.

Poltergeist Prodigy will be available on Steam an Itch.io on March 6th.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3454810/Poltergeist_Prodigy/
Itch.io: https://peacockpieproductions.itch.io/poltergeist-prodigy-demo
